Topic.Title: How to enable transcripts for a game?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi,
I've just created a game and I would like transcripts to be available. How do I make sure that they are? Or is it automatic?
Cheryl
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Hello!

Are you using the desktop player, and are you good at adding stuff to a game in code view (and Javascript files to a game)?

https://github.com/KVonGit/QuestStuff/wiki/Transcripts
